LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.label: RPK-74
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Good range, low power, high rate of fire。
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Galil.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.label: L-15 LMG
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.label: MA39X ICWS
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.description: The MA39X Individual Combat Weapon System (MA39X ICWS or MA39X Assault rifle) is a close combat service rifle of the UNSC。
LanguageData.Gun_HeavyCombatRifle.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.label: M249 LMG SAW MG
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.description: M249 LMG SAW MG, a heavy machinegun. It has a 120 round magazine and fires in 20 round bursts. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire。
LanguageData.Gun_HHMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: XM214 Microgun
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: A multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built。
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.label: M56 Smart Gun
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.description: The M56 Smartgun is a man-portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities chambered for heavy ammunition. It is notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. It hurts like hell。
LanguageData.Gun_M56_USCM.tools.0.label: barrel
